name: Sample Mechanics - Bubble Bobble Clone
description:
A simple clone of Bubble Bobble, made in Godot 3.5.1 for studying purposes.

There are only two levels, but I plan on adding more and a simple menu just for fun.

Controls:

A - Move left
D - Move right
W - Jump
Space / Left Mouse Button - Shoot bubbles

v0.2 - Added two more levels and remade the first two.
